content: this simple lace scarf crochet pattern is adorned with three styles of two-round flowers > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 1 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing crocheting flat in row special stitch petal includes written description in pattern crocheting into chain spaces includes video tutorial **skill level** easy **finished size** teen/adult 4 5 11 5 cm wide x 60 152 5 cm long **materials** king cole cotton top dk 2 yarn 78% acrylic/22% cotton 3 5 oz/100 g 284 yd/260 m 1 skein each in 4223 mist mc 4224 teal ca and 4225 lilac cb *or approximately 284 yd 260 m in mc and 30 yd 27 5 m each in ca and cb in any light weight cotton/acrylic blend yarn * us size i-9/5 5 mm crochet hook *or size needed to obtain gauge * yarn needle locking stitch markers optional **gauge** 21 double_crochet = 4 5 11 5 cm across *exact gauge is not critical for this project * *this pattern was originally published in february 2022 as the allfreecrochet winter 2022 mystery crochet along * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/03/26/flor-lace-scarf-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/king-cole-cotton-top-dk utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=35c8ae00
